mapper.insert: insert into member (mberNo,mberId,password,name,phone,email, addr1,detailAddr,firstRegDate,firstRegId, auth) values (member_seq.nextval,#{mberId},#{password},#{name},#{phone},#{email}, #{addr1},#{detailAddr},sysdate,#{mberId}, #{auth})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where mberId = #{mberId}
select count(*) from member where email = #{email}
select mberId from member where email =#{email}
select password from member where email =#{email} and mberId =#{mberId}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password} where mberId =#{mberId}
mapper.select: select * from member where mberId=#{mberId} and password=#{password}
